h1_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit
h2_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Location
content: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top are enemies you will face in a boss fight in Bushui Cave, which is the secret area in the Flaming Mountains. Unlocking the secret area and gaining access to Bushui Cave is a long process. Follow these instructions to get there:

Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top are enemies you will face in a boss fight in Bushui Cave, which is the secret area in the Flaming Mountains. Unlocking the secret area and gaining access to Bushui Cave is a long process. Follow these instructions to get there:
